title: Images of man
creator_credit: David Roberts, Don Murray and Film Australia
brief_description: A study of the various styles of Aboriginal rock art found in Kakadu National Park and Arnhem Land in the Northern Territory. Australian world authority on this subject, George Chaloupka, a field anthropologist with the Museum and Art Galleries Board of the Northern Territory, explains some of the unique and beautiful rock paintings to be found in this area.
